\ Nail the Deadline helps you focus on what is important and keeps you away from your phone. 
\ You can earn a cat by simply setting yourself a task and focusing on it! Whether you will get a cat depends on how much time you spent on your task. The longer you focus on the task, the higher probability you will get a cat. There are 12 cat species. Some of them are very rare and you must spend long enough time on your task to get them. (Gotta catch'em all!!) 
\ Some tips: if the total time you spend on the task is less than 1 hour, you will not get a cat (Oops!). The total time is accumulated until the deadline has come. 
\ When you're focusing on the app, we expect you not to use other apps. If you start using other apps, the stopwatch will stop automatically. Also, we're detecting the location in the meanwhile. If you move too far, we will stop counting as well.

\ This app requires long time (> 60min) to see all functions. For example, users will get notification when they focus on the task for an hour, the purpose of which is to remind them to take a break. Also, the cat collection depends on the time spent, you will need to spend a lot of time (~ 10 hr) to get rare cats. \n\ Attention: For testing purpose, I have intentionally set 1 second to 10 minutes, 6 seconds to 1 hour, so that you will be able to get notification when you spend 6s on the task.
